messages.firstPerson: You poke {target} repeatedly. Poke, poke, poke!
messages.secondPerson: {actor} pokes you. Poke, poke, poke! Hey, cut that out!
messages.untargeted: You poke the air in front of you. It's not very effective.
messages.untargetedRoom: {actor} pokes the air mysteriously. Are they practicing?
